rows.label: tlk70000061_04_msg0001
rows.name:
Ever since Rita came back to the
capital, she's been behaving a lot
more responsibly.

rows.label: tlk70000061_04_msg0002
rows.name:
What with everything that happened
in Gula, she'd been a bundle of
pure nerves up till now.

rows.label: tlk70000061_04_msg0003
rows.name:
When I saw her like that, I began to
feel like it was my duty to protect
her however I could.

rows.label: tlk70000061_04_msg0004
rows.name:
I'm not talking about my duty as a
Blade. She's truly precious to me.

rows.label: tlk70000061_04_msg0005
rows.name:
It's true that her clumsiness might
not see us through life as easily as
with other Blades...

rows.label: tlk70000061_04_msg0006
rows.name:
But I'm starting to think that that's
actually a good thing. That the burden
we both share is really a blessing.

rows.label: tlk70000061_04_msg0007
rows.name:
Nobody ever said that a short life
had to be an unhappy one. And I
intend to make ours one full of joy...
